lines.text: I'll kill your friends, your family, and the bitch you took to the prom!
Betty Jo Bialowski? I can get you an address on that, if you want.
[first lines]

Long ago, the Duke of Milan commissioned a little known artist to erect a Mammoth statue of a horse. The time was 1481... The artist was Leonardo da Vinci... The guy on the donkey's just a guy on a donkey.
If the Mario brothers weren't New Jersey's third-largest crime family, I'd say, "Kiss my ass." But considering your status, I will say, "Slurp my butt."
I am the waiter, sir.
Oh. Very nice. Fettucini con fungi porcinni. Prego. Oh, and bring me a bottle of ketchup, will ya?
You heard him.
Ketchup! Ketchup! Stupid Americanos, always ketchup...
Hey, this doesn't taste like cappuccino.
Oh. I guess I put too much ethyl chloride in it.

[after Hawk learns she is a nun]
It doesn't mean I don't love you.
Oh, no! You love me! It's your *job*! You probably love Butterfinger over there.
Well, yeah, in a weird sort of Catholic way, I do.
Will you play Nintendo with me?
I can't think of anyone I'd rather play Nintendo with.
Bless me, Father, for I have sinned. It's been 1,200 hours since my last confession.

[yawning]
Hit me with your best shot.
I betrayed a man. A good man. An innocent man. A thief.

[drugged]
I'm not a very good damsel in a dress, am I?
[manly voice]
Pay the rent!
[girly voice]
But I can't pay the rent!
[makes more dolphin noises]
Yo, Flipper! "Damsel in distress" implies that there is some well-hung Dudley Do-Right galloping up to save you. It ain't gonna happen, see? Hudson Hawk go boom-boom.
[Tommy Five-Tone is miraculously alive at the end of the film]
You're supposed to be all cracked up at the bottom of the hill!
Airbags! Can you fucking believe it?
You're supposed to be blown up into fiery chunks of flesh!
Sprinkler system set up in the back! Can you *fucking* believe it?

In one day - less than one day of planning, and you did it. You started the week by stealing the Sforza and ended by swiping the Codex. What are your plans for the weekend? Hoisting away the Coliseum? Tell me, did the Devil make you do it, or did Darwin and Minerva Mayflower?
Can't we just go back to the kissing part?
[last lines]
With the world saved and the secrets of Da Vinci protected, Eddie finally got his coffee.
[to a waiter at a classy restaurant in Rome]
steak burger! French Fries? This is France, you gotta have French Fries.
Actually, it's Italy, Butterfinger... she said, as if it made a difference.
Ah, to be in "Paree" and in love!
Oh, the Pope warned me never to trust the CIA!
[Hawk has just decapitated a villain]
Looks like you won't be attending that hat convention in July.
I got a proposition for ya.
Answer's "no," Gates... Even if you bathe.
But I want to do community service; I want to teach the handicapped how to yodel.
673 Wongs in the phone book.
Hmmm. Helluva lotta Wong numbers.
Did I miss anything?

Gates tries to blackmail me, you ask me "Did I miss anything." Gates gets killed, you say "Did I miss anything." I bet you went up to Mrs. Lincoln at the Ford Theatre and said "How was the show? Did I miss anything?"
So, Hawkmeister. We've got you clothes, a great hotel and a 250,000 lira per diem.
That's 200 dollars a day. So he can get a hooker and some tequila? Veto, Darwin!
I guess we see who wears the penis in this family.
The last ingredient in the recipe is Da Vinci's model of a helicopter...
...on display for three days only at the Louvre in Paris.
As opposed to the Louvre in Wisconsin?
Shut up, you're going to make me lose my train of thought!
I'll torture you so slowly, you'll think it's a career.
Anna, we're supposed to be saving you.
I know. I got bored so I saved myself.
How am I driving? 1-800-I'm-gonna-fuckin'-die!

[as the limo goes over the cliff]
MY PENSION!
[to the two museum guards who wanted to catch Hawk and Five-Tone and fell]
Get up, you're embarrassing me!

[about his disappointing henchmen]
I suppose we're just going to have to kill them.
[Before Igg and Ook can object, Minerva raises a pistol and shoots each of them in the head]
Igg!
Ook!
[They fall down dead]
God, Minerva! I was just joking!
[They laugh hysterically]

[leaping around, desperately trying to remove the time bomb stuck to his forehead]
Get this fucking thing off my head!
Hey Tommy, look at Snickers.
Yeah, he's about to have a bad migraine.
[the timer runs out. Nothing happens]
Maybe it was a dud.
[the bomb beeps, and Hawk and Tommy jump out the window just as it explodes, taking Snickers and Almong Joy with it]
They had the worst ketchup when I was in prison.
[freezes, realizing his slip]
Prison?

[struggling]
... I was the warden...?
The man knows! The man knows!
[looking down from the roof of the auction house when escaping the guard]
I can't tell you how happy I am that we covered our tracks.

[to Hawk]
You know they invented something while you were inside? It's called "the watch".
Darwin, this is supposed to be torture, not therapy.
[George and his entire gang laugh when they reveal to Hudson that Anna is a nun]
Those better be tears you're crying, Tommy.

[laughing and trying not to show it]
They are!
History, tradition, culture... are not concepts! These are trophies I keep in my den as paperweights! The chaos we will cause with this machine will be our final masterpiece!
You fuck my freedom for a lousy job?
Is looking like a constipated warthog a prerequisite for getting a job in the art world?
If Da Vinci was alive today, he'd be eating microwave sushi, naked, in the back of a Cadillac with the both of us.
You New York Italian, father-made-twenty-bucks-a-week son of a bitch.
He's definitely gonna steal the Codex. I can feel it. I'm not sure when.
Attempt to steal, you mean. The vanity in this man Hudson Hawk! The Vatican has foiled the advances of pirates and terrorists. We will not lie down for some schmuck from New Jersey.
Money isn't everything - gold is. Fuck T-bills! Fuck blue chip stocks! Fuck junk bonds! We've got the real deal! Money will always be paper, but gold will always be GOLD!
[repeated line]
Bunny, ball ball.
What can I tell you? I'm the villain.
I knew this is what I'd get for darting a nun!
That doughnut-hole-eating, son-of-a-bitch, take-it-in-the-ear-for-a-beer, rat bastard!
Reindeer Goat Cheese Pizza?
Waldo, 100 million clams! Yes!
That's 100 millon dollars to Mr. Darwin Mayflower.
100 million and one, Waldo!
Fantastic! 100 million dollars and one.
Outbid by mine own wench! Quelle bummere!
Don't hate me baby!
So, when's this Sebastian Cabot Buckingham Palace-looking butler-head motherfucker getting here?

[Alfred enters through door]
Any minute now, Mr. Gates.

[sardonic]
Sorry, 'Jeeves'.
[Anna, Tommy and Hudson Hawk are passing by the Forum Romanum]
What's with all these stones in people's back yard?
That is called ruins...
Anthony Mario, Cesar Mario. I didn't know the circus was in town.
So, Hawk, why won't you do the Auction House?
Call me superstitious, Cesar, but I don't like committing a crime within 24 hours of getting out of the joint.
Come on, Hawk. It's one night;s work, you take their thingy and put it in this thingy.
Directions even your brother can understand.
Yeah! Directions even I can understand...

[slaps Anthony on the shoulder]
Shut up!
Look, Hawk, if you wanna go straight, open up a hardware store and sell spatulas, be my guest.
You know, if the Marios weren't the 3rd largest crime family in New York I'd say "Kiss my Ass" but considering your status I'm gonna say "Slurp my Butt."

[walks over with a bottle of wine]
Have you ladies sampled our fine house wine? I think you'll enjoy it.
Beat it Tommy, huh? No Dionsaurs allowed.

[smashes the bottle over Anthony's head]
Here!

[holds back his men from going after Tommy and Hawk]
Stop! Let's go.

[after throwing Butterfinger head first into the phone booth]
Want a little more, Jumbo? I'll kick your big flabby ass!
Impressive, Hawk. Enjoying Italy?

[rubs his chin after being hit in the face]
Yeah.
Yes, I have always had a soft spot in my heart for Rome. I did my first bare-handed strangulation here. Communist politician.
Why George, you big softie.
God, I miss Communisim. The Red Threat, people were scared... the agency had some respect, and I got laid every night. Snickers, brief him.
Good news Hawk, the Mayflowers have moved up the timetable, you're hitting the Vatican tonight.
Oh no! No no, hold on, no way! The timing is off, I'm underequipped, and besides that, I've got a date.

[grabs Hudson's list and reads it]
Grapple, biker's bottle, pocket fisherman, olive oil, 100 stamps? Gee stud, this's going to be some date! No Harvey's Bristol Cream?

Snickers, make that list happen. Oh, and Hawk, it's one thing to mess with the Mayflowers, but we're sore losers. We blow up space shuttles for breakfast. You and your friend Tommy are nothing more than... a late afternoon Triscuit. Ciao.
[He and Snickers walk away]
Hey! Old man! Yeah, you! You come back here without your little Cub Scout army, and I'll kick your Centrally-Intelligent Ass up one side of the piazza and down the other!
[Kit Kat has been standing behind him, mimicking his tirade. Hawk finishes, and elbows Kit Kat in the face. Kit Kat hands Hawk a card]

[reading]
"Beware the blue wire."
[Hawk looks up and does a double take to see Kit Kat has disappeared, and Butterfinger handing him 100 stamps]
Hey Mr. Hawk, I got your stamps.

[imitating BooBoo]
Good, Yogi.
"MY NAME IS KIT KAT. THIS IS NOT A DREAM." Then he chops Hawk on the back of the neck and walks off. Next, Snickers appears and shocks Hawk with a taser]
OW! What the fuck is the matter with you?
Name's Snickers. Your plane leaves in forty.
[He walks off. A crate falls open and a woman appears]
Almond Joy. Get it? Candy bars. It's better than when we first started out, our code names were diseases. Do you know what it's like being called Chlamydia for a year? Whoops, forgot.
[She backfists Hawk in the face and walks off. Then a huge man steps out of a port-o-potty, catches his jacket in the door and tips the port-o-potty over trying to get free]
The name's Butterfinger.
No shit.

[appears]
Do you like the Company's new look? I call them the MTV-IA.
no old CIA/new CIA jokes.
Punks. They think that the Bay of Pigs is an herbal tea and that the Cold War has something to do with Penguins.
Don't I know you?
The last time you saw me, I was bald, with a beard and no mustache, and I had a different nose. So if you don't recognize me, I won't be offended.
My high school science teacher?

[laughs]
I'm the guy who tricked you into robbing the government installation, and then had you sent to prison for it.
George Kaplan.
[Hawk rushes toward him to strangle him, and is instantly surrounded by guns]
Ha-ha... I'm not the type to hold a grudge, George.
Guys, we got some good news and some bad news.
The good news is, you'll be completely un-paralyzed in about two minutes.
The bad news is, that only leaves you five seconds to defuse the bombs.
"Bombs"?
05. He and Almond Joy laugh]
I'm so glad it had to end like this. I'll just shoot one in the kitchen for good measure...
I want to make it up to you, kid. That's why I got you this gig. And to quote the late, great Karen Carpenter, "we have only just begun."
My employer wants a meeting.
Your employer? The President?
No, somebody powerful.
[looks over Hawk's shoulder]
Good God! What's that?

[laughs]
Now, George, you don't really expect me to fall for that old trick, do you?

[chuckles]
Shucks, I guess not.
[punches Hawk unconscious]

Listen, Hawk, this might be hard to believe, but I'm just a regular Joe. I just want to be happy. And happiness comes from the achievement of goals. It's just that when you've made your first billion by the age of nineteen, it's hard to keep coming up with new ones. But now, finally, I've got myself a new goal... World domination!
I hated cigarettes until I saw my first NO SMOKING sign. Keep off the grass? Let's play soccer. The law I cared for was friendship. I broke that one too, didn't I.
I went to a lot of trouble to get this for you! Now where the hell's my cut?
[Alfred pops one of his knives and slashes Gates's throat. Gates falls down dead]
So much for his "cut."
[chuckles]
Forgive my dry British humor.

Why is the world jam packed with such idiots? Every Schmo has a fantasy that the planet revolves around them. It rains, a car crash happens, they say 'How can this happen to me?' But for us, this isn't a fantasy, it is a reality.

Oh yes! If De Vinci were alive today, he'd be eating microwaved sushi, naked in the back of a Cadillac with the both of us. The project of his life is now toy of mine. History... Tradition... Culture... are not concepts. These are trophies I keep in my den as paperweights! The chaos we will cause with this machine will be our final masterpiece!

[drugged]
I feel like a dolphin who's never tasted melted snow. What does the color blue taste like? Bobo knows? Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! I must speak with the dolphins now. Eeeee-eeee-eee-eeeeeee!
Wow. You were... in the joint. Doing... hard time. You know, it's funny, but that excites me. I seem to have a thing for sinners.
Well, I seem to have a thing for sinning.
[to waiter]
Check please.
